item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/685/comment-page-1#comment-2165">Dave Quick</a>.
It is free for anyone to use, so I can't complain too loudly -- and the fancy shmancy Ajax features should more than make up for the scheduling method snafu!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dave Quick.

It is free for anyone to use, so I can’t complain too loudly — and the fancy shmancy Ajax features should more than make up for the scheduling method snafu!

item.title: By: Dave Quick
item.dc:creator: Dave Quick
item.description: I especially like the fact that it brags about supporting a Joel Spolsky scheduling method that Joel no longer advocates. Excellent marketing. :-)
item.content:encoded: I especially like the fact that it brags about supporting a Joel Spolsky scheduling method that Joel no longer advocates. Excellent marketing. :-)
